trans-unit.source: Represents a row header of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um cabeçalho de linha de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The row status images (pencil, asterisk, and arrow) are resized according to the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```
trans-unit.target: As imagens de estado de linha (lápis, asterisco e seta) são redimensionadas, de acordo com a definição do sistema DPI quando o ficheiro App. config contém a seguinte entrada:``` <appSettings> <add key="EnableWindowsFormsHighDpiAutoResizing" value="true" /> </appSettings> ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata esta célula.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto acessível para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se não chame o método CreateAccessibilityInstance explicitamente, este será chamado quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Obter ou definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, tem de adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assemblagem instalada com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado da célula para copiar para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, this method is called by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo do valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, este método é denominado do controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>método para obter um valor formatado da área de transferência que representa a célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros relacionados com a posição deste método indicam onde esta célula está localizada na tabela de dados que representa a região definida pelas células selecionadas no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo da posição da célula, pode ser devolvido formatação informações através deste método, para além do valor de célula.

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o formato HTML para uma célula na primeira coluna de uma linha incluirá a etiqueta que indica o início de uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Os formatos de área de transferência suportados incluem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da linha que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula está a ser a primeira coluna da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula é a última coluna da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula está a ser a primeira linha da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a célula está a ser a última linha da região definida pelas células selecionadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de formato atual da célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>que representa o valor da célula para copiar para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is less than zero or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the control.
trans-unit.target: rowIndexé menor que zero ou maior que ou igual ao número de linhas no controlo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> and cell style.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses área conteúdo da célula, que é calculada utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> e o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> bounds que o conteúdo da célula.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's error icon, if one is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o retângulo delimitador que encloses ícone de erro da célula, se um é apresentado.

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de gráficos para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> a aplicar à célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's error icon, if one is displayed; otherwise, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que bounds ícone de erro da célula, se estiver apresentado; caso contrário, <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the error for the cell.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma cadeia que representa o erro para a célula.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: A string that describes the error for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que descreve o erro para o atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the inherited shortcut menu for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o menu de atalho herdado para a linha especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The index must be -1 to indicate the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: O índice tem de ser -1 para indicar a linha de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of the row if one exists; otherwise, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> inherited from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> da linha de não existir um; caso contrário, o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> herdadas <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property of the cell is not and the specified rowIndex is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade da célula não está e especificado rowIndex é inferior a 0 ou superior ao número de linhas no controlo menos 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo aplicado à célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be populated with the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> para ser preenchidos com o estilo de célula herdada.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include inherited colors in the returned cell style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir herdadas cores o estilo de célula devolvido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that includes the style settings of the cell inherited from the cell's parent row, column, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que inclui as definições de estilo de célula herdada a partir da linha do elemento principal da célula, coluna e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o tamanho preferencial, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizada para desenhar a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que representa o estilo da célula.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero de linha da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho máximo permitido a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho preferencial, em pixels, da célula.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: A `rowIndex` value of -1 indicates a shared row.
trans-unit.target: A `rowIndex` valor de -1 indica que uma linha partilhada.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor contido no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the property of the cell is not and rowIndex is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the parent .
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade da célula não está e rowIndex é inferior a -1 ou superior ou igual ao número de linhas no principal .

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha atual <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizado para pintura o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> que tem de ser repainted.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que contém os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valores que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro que está associada a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> que contém os estilos do limite para a célula que está a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> valores que especifica que as partes da célula tem de ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da célula.

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de principal da célula.

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: O valor de célula para definir.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor tiver sido definido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a representação de cadeia da célula.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa a célula actual.
